name: One-Minute Blaster
description:
This is my game for the RNDGame Jam 2021

One-Minute Blaster is a short  shooter in which you pilot a space craft with one minute of uncontrolled rapid shooting. Use these shots to destroy asteroids to gain points, but watch out, asteroids split into three pieces when shot and will do damage to your ship.

Known Bugs:

Audio is a bit off: It stutters when changing scenes. It's just weird in the main menu, I don't know how else to describe it, it just feels weird...

HighScore system not working: The system I had implemented for keeping highscore does not work in html format for whatever reason. (My personal highscore is 5600, comment if you beat it)

Asteroids can spawn onto of you, but I sort of fixed it in a cheap way by giving you temporary immunity to them when they spawn so you shouldn't lose a life from one spawning on you. Sorry if you do...

Please comment if you think you have found any more bugs :)

Thank you for playing, I hope you enjoyed the game!
